synopsis.text:
Together with the abrupt disappearance of the sun and the annihilation of his hometown, Arata Kasuga's mundane life is shattered by the catastrophic 'Breakdown Phenomenon.' A mysterious magician, Lilith Asami, presents him with an ultimatum: surrender the powerful spell book in his possession or face death. However, Arata defies the odds and opts to enroll in the clandestine Royal Biblia Academy, where he encounters the Trinity Seven - an elite group of seven enchanting and formidable mages, each embodying one of the seven deadly sins.

As Arata navigates through this new world of magic, he is driven by the memories of his cousin and cherished friend, Hijiri Kasuga, who was lost during the Breakdown Phenomenon. Determined to save his friend and restore his world, Arata must master his magical abilities and harness the power of the Trinity Seven. Alongside the challenges he faces, Arata finds himself amidst amusing and somewhat risqu√© situations with his captivating new companions.

In this thrilling adventure, Arata will discover the true purpose behind the magician's arrival and the significance of the Grimoire entrusted to him. As a potential candidate for the Demon Lord, he must learn to control the seven sins and forge his path towards becoming a formidable magician, all while unlocking the secrets of the Breakdown Phenomenon.
